message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand that $120 is a bit tight for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $140. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
I'm trying to find a sweet spot for you, Bob. I can do $135. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your efforts to find a sweet spot, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm not willing to go below $135, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from $125. How about we try $130 again?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $122?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can do $128. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $128 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
